title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Language Proficiency Course Through Structured Learning Outcomes Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related language proficiency and managerial leadership experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can interpret language-related Intended Learning Outcomes (ILOs) with 80% accuracy using structured diagramming techniques.
Learners can design diagram-based learning pathways to develop self-directed language learning plans.
Learners can derive at least three job-related language tasks using structured ILO formulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
